physical_appearance:\A picture of a mechanical handheld game is depicted. This game comes in a detachable box that is predominantly green in colour. The name of the mechanical toy
 \\Racketeer\u0027s Rally\\ is printed on the front and sides of the box. A \\Made in Singapore\\ statement is also stated at its bottom left hand corner. The game device has two white rotary buttons near the lower end
subject_terms_1:with a screen that takes up about four-fifth of the entire device. The image in the screen is one of roads games play (recreation) technology (general associated concept) brand name objects
subject_terms_2:straight and at times winding Games Amusements Technology Brand name products
subject_terms_3:with obstacles such as houses and grasses at the sides. A miniature red image of a car can be seen at the road closest to the bottom of the screen. \

metadata.title_text: Tomy Pocketeer Rally handheld game Tomy Pocketeer Rally handheld game and box
metadata.physical_appearance: "A picture of a mechanical handheld game is depicted. This game comes in a detachable box that is predominantly green in colour. The name of the mechanical toy, ""Racketeer's Rally"" is printed on the front and sides of the box. A ""Made in Singapore"" statement is also stated at its bottom left hand corner. The game device has two white rotary buttons near the lower end
metadata.subject_terms_1: with a screen that takes up about four-fifth of the entire device. The image in the screen is one of roads games play (recreation) technology (general associated concept) brand name objects
metadata.subject_terms_2: straight and at times winding Games Amusements Technology Brand name products
metadata.subject_terms_3: with obstacles such as houses and grasses at the sides. A miniature red image of a car can be seen at the road closest to the bottom of the screen. "
